content: hopscotch hopscotch by isabel mcalister bell hopscotch is a quick winter leg warmer pattern written with a choice of striping and plain colour options you and your child can choose from a variety of styles and colour- ways to create your own individual pair hopscotch is a versatile knit your child will want to wear in the chilly playground at school through the colder weather they also make great quick gifts materials approx 136 yrds / 124 m / 59 grms 8ply/dk weight yarn 3 5mm us 4 circular needle 24 / 60cm or longer or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 30 sts and 36 row = 4 / 10cm in st st useful links jeny s stretchy slip knot cast on size http //curiousknitter blogspot com/2009/09/j approx 10 length eny-stretchy-slipknot-cast-on html the pattern has been written to fit infants but jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind-off can be easily adjusted to fit by lengthening or http //www knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo shortening the main st st body of the leg php warmer in between the ribbed cuffs notes abbreviations when knitting one of the striping options the k- knit knitter can choose p- purl to cut the yarn at the end of each colour st s -
